TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A measure of weight. A milligram is approximately 450,000 times smaller than a pound and 28,000 times smaller than an ounce.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medida de peso. Un miligramo es aproximadamente 450.000 veces m치s peque침o que una libra y 28.000 veces m치s peque침o que una onza.
